nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_502
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: There are twenty universities in this city, some of which are world-famous.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_503
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The more he thinks about it, the angrier he becomes.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_504
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She was filled with pity for the innocent victims.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_505
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He was occupied with his business matters and didn't have time to think about a holiday.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_506
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The country's economy depends to some degree on the import of raw materials.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_507
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: After several discussions between the members of the committee, a new plan of action began to take shape.
